name: 2048 Merge Bubbles!
description:
Shoot n Merge Bubbles, you can make the highest number bubble.
Ready to merge number bubbles?
How far can you go?

HOW TO PLAY
1. Just shoot the bubble onto another one with the same number.
2. Merge them into a bigger number.
3. Make a target number, you can escape to the next stage.
4. Try to remove multiple bubbles at a time to get a higher score.

FEATURES
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy the merging bubbles anytime, anywhere!
• NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy merge bubbles at your own pace!

NOTES
• 2048 Merge bubbles! supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
• 2048 Merge bubbles! contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, videos to house ads.
• 2048 Merge bubbles! is free to play, however, you may purchase Ad-Free.

Need Help? Have Questions?
We value your feedback! Please contact us at help@bitmango.com
